title: Im So Sorry (Perma Banned)
body: Can i please be unbanned ive been banned on this account for about 6 weeks now and i know i have said some stupid stuff in the past but i promise I have learnt my lesson and i will never flame or be toxic again i have been using this account for years now and all my hard work just being thrown into the bin just like that is the worst feeling so please RIOT i swear if you give me another chance i will never make the same mistake again Ive spent so much money on this account and I regret all the toxic things ive said to my team I promise that ive learnt to control my anger and will never do it on this account again,  I wouldn't be typing this if I didn't care so PLEASE RIOT CAN I HAVE ONE MORE CHANCE!!!

replies.body:
Can't say I pity you tbh.
You probably deserved it.
Heart felt... yeah I guess  but trolls and toxic people deserve to burn in hell for all I care. If Riot games banned you... you probably had it coming... that's all I'm gonna say
Just make a new account, riot wont unban you
dam then if they wont that really sucks
